h3.style: margin: 10px 0px; font-family: "Open Sans", Arial, sans-serif; line-height: 20px; color: #c52229; text-rendering: optimizelegibility; font-size: 13px; text-transform: uppercase; text-align: center
h3.strong: FOR UP-TO-DATE INFORMATION ABOUT COVID-19 AND RESOURCES, VISIT WWW.CORONAVIRUS.OHIO.GOV.

div.style: font-family: "Open Sans", Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; text-align: center

span.div:
The Ohio Department of Health opened a call center to answer questions from the public regarding coronavirus (COVID-19). The call center will be open 7 days a week from
9:00 a.m. to 8:00 p.m. and can be reached at 1-833-4-ASK-ODH (1-833-427-5634)

div.style: font-family: "Open Sans", Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14px; text-align: center

div.span:
In accordance with Gov. DeWine's order DLA will be closed
for the rest of the 2019-2020 school year. Please watch for changing information as the situation evolves.

div.h2: A School Culture of Joy and Achievement

div.p: Parents are satisfied with DLA as their child’s school according to mid-year survey.
In Progress and Gap Closing on Ohio state school report card.

video.data-setup: { "autoplay": true, "controls": true, "muted": false, "loop": true, "loadingSpinner": true, "fluid": true, "techOrder": ["html5","flash"], "ga": {"eventsToTrack": ["start"]} }

source.p: To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video

div.h2: The Dayton Leadership Academies is a free charter school in Dayton, Ohio. We are a K-8th grade school serving over 400 students. The Dayton Leadership Academies strives to educate and nurture each student to his or her highest academic ability. We maintain a culture of pride and excellence for each student. Our school culture and community provides proactive support for each student and continually incorporates our core values of being safe, being respectful, being responsible and becoming positive leaders.

li.span: Each child will excel in high school, college, and careers by students, parents, and teachers working hard together.
We educate and nurture each child to perform at his or her highest academic ability in a school culture of pride and excellence.

div.class: col-sm-hidden col-md-4 col-md-offset-1 col-lg-3 col-lg-offset-2 hp_missvis_rightimg
